.
A&A Qualification: Surviving Spouses and Parents Entitled to Survivors Pension, DIC, or Death Compensation
Surviving spouses and parents who are eligible for Survivors Pension, DIC, or death compensation may qualify for A&A under
38 CFR 3.351
.
Note
:  Survivors Pension benefits include current-law pension, Section 306 Pension, Old-Law Pension, and Spanish-American War Pension.  However, beneficiaries receiving Section 306 Pension or Old-Law Pension cannot receive a higher rate unless they elect Survivors Pension.
Reference
:  For more information on conditional election, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 1.A.1.c
.
